A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What makes this film arguably the best in the entire saga is its honest storytelling and heart-felt message of hope and what it means to be a person who believes. Hope\, family\, friendship\, loyalty\, and saving the ones you love are what allow people to survive in a world torn by tyranny and hatred. Star Wars Episode VIII: The Last Jedi wasn't just a Star Wars film\, it was a life lesson.
